altername_name: Super Robot Wars OG Saga: Masou Kishin II: Revelation of Evil God
name: Super Robot Taisen OG Saga: Masou Kishin II: Revelation of Evil God
overview: Super Robot Wars OG Saga: Masou Kishin 2: Revelation of Evil God (often shortened to to Masou Kishin II) is a turn-based strategy RPG developed by Winkysoft and released as part of Banpresto's long-running Super Robot Wars franchise.
